firm_information.name: Coldwell Banker Myers-Gallagher - Rockport
firm_information.location: 3002 Highway 35 North, Suite D Rockport, TX 78382

house_listing.house_description: 936 South 11th Street Aransas Pass, Texas 78336 United States. This wonderful custom built family home has everything!! Large living area w/ fireplace, dining room, kitchen, all with ceramic tile floors, 3 (split) bedrooms fully carpeted, 2 full baths, and 2-car garage...Spectacular landscaping; sprinkler system.
